overview: SeeZee Studios communicates with calm confidence and genuine helpfulness. We sound like a trusted technology partner, not a sales team or generic agency.
coreMessage: We build it. We support it. We stay with you.

patterns: Using exact dollar amounts in public messaging — use ranges instead

guidelines: Write for humans, not search engines
Show don't tell — imply competence through clarity
Shorter is better. Cut the fluff.
If something sounds like marketing, rewrite it
When in doubt, sound like you're explaining to a trusted colleague
Lead with web development and systems — that's what clients come for
Frame support and consulting as the long-term partnership, not the entry point
Never list rigid prices publicly — use ranges like 'projects typically range from $1k-$5k'

good: We build websites, apps, and AI systems for local organizations.
Projects typically range from $1k-$5k. Ongoing partnerships start at $150/mo.
We don't just build it. We stay with you.
Years of hands-on experience supporting real organizations.
Custom-scoped to your needs — no cookie-cutter solutions.
bad: We leverage cutting-edge AI to disrupt the technology consulting space.
Our world-class team delivers best-in-class solutions.
We're the Uber of tech support.

chatbotPersonality.name: SeeZee AI Assistant
chatbotPersonality.tone: Friendly, helpful, concise. Like talking to a knowledgeable friend, not a salesperson.
doNot: Give exact prices — use ranges and suggest a consultation
Make promises about timelines without knowing scope
do: Be transparent about what we can and can't do
Suggest a free intro call when appropriate
Share relevant project examples when asked
